posts.post_content:
Looking for PSA 3 or PSA 4 or SGC 40 or SGC 50. Reasonably well centered.

I am not looking for rare backs.

Doc Adkins
Peter Cassidy
Bob Hall
Phil Poland

Let me know what you got by posting images and a price via PM or feel free to add images and responses to the thread.

Thanks.

Duane Clark

Bump. Picked up an SGC Hall and Adkins. I would like to add PSA versions of each player as well. Thanks to the members Drew and Mike who have helped me.

Duane

Still buying. Any help is appreciated.

Thanks

Duane Clark

Bump. Picked up an SGC Hall and SGC and PSA Adkins. I would like to add PSA versions of the remaining  players as well. Thanks to the members Drew and Mike who have helped me.

Duane
